description: Source files implementing the AppGateway plugin for the WPEFramework, including main classes, implementation, responder, resolver, and module components.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Plugin::AppGateway
classes.description: Main class representing the AppGateway plugin, responsible for initialization and registration.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Plugin::AppGateway::Implementation
classes.description: Implementation class containing core functionalities of the plugin.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Plugin::AppGateway::Responder
classes.description: Handles request-response interactions pertaining to the plugin.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Plugin::AppGateway::Resolver
classes.description: Resolves dependencies or configurations needed for the plugin.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Plugin::AppGateway::Module
classes.description: Module class that encapsulates plugin module-level initialization.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin or component, setting up necessary resources.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up resources and de-registers the component.
